Class LatexManager

  services.latex.LatexManager

public class LatexManager
extends java.lang.Object

Coordinates the LaTeX rendering.

Lenko Grigorov

isLatexEnabled

public static boolean isLatexEnabled()
Returns true if LaTeX rendering of labels is on, false otherwise.

Returns:
true if LaTeX rendering of labels is on, false otherwise

setLatexEnabledFromMenu

protected static void setLatexEnabledFromMenu(boolean b)
Called when LaTeX rendering of labels is turned on or off from the menu.

A separate method is needed because setLatexEnabled(boolean) modifies the menu item which in turn triggers a call back from the menu item, leading to an infinite loop of calls.

Parameters:
b - true to turn LaTeX rendering on, false to turn LaTeX rendering off
See Also:
setLatexEnabled(boolean), LatexManager.SetLatexUpdater

setLatexEnabled

public static void setLatexEnabled(boolean b)
Switches LaTeX rendering of labels on and off.

Parameters:
b - true to turn LaTeX rendering on, false to turn LaTeX rendering off
See Also:
setLatexEnabledFromMenu(boolean)

getRenderer

public static Renderer getRenderer()
Returns the Renderer to be used for rendering LaTeX.

Returns:
the Renderer to be used for rendering LaTeX

handleRenderingProblem

public static void handleRenderingProblem()
Handle the situation when a LaTeX rendering problem occurs. Turns off LaTeX rendering of the labels. Asks the user if they wish to verify the LaTeX settings.

getFontSize

public static float getFontSize()
